html:
2026-0144
2026-02-24FIN, GACCustoms TariffOrder Amending the China Surtax Order (2024)Order Amending the China Surtax Order (2024) in order to (1) repeal the surtax of 100% applicable to imports of electric vehicles that originate from China; and (2) to clarify that the 25% surtax applies to certain steel or aluminum goods that can be classified under a tariff item in Chapter 99 of Canada’s Customs Tariff.Registration: SOR/2026-0033 Publication Date: 2026-03-11
subject: Order Amending the China Surtax Order (2024)
precis: Order Amending the China Surtax Order (2024) in order to (1) repeal the surtax of 100% applicable to imports of electric vehicles that originate from China; and (2) to clarify that the 25% surtax applies to certain steel or aluminum goods that can be classified under a tariff item in Chapter 99 of Canada’s Customs Tariff.
